attributes.action: Prevent councils from levying an extra charge to collect rubbish, over and above council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Councils are being actively encouraged to introduce extra charges for refuse collection (while at the same time often reducing the frequency of the service).
This is an outrage as this basic service has already been paid for as part of the grossly inflated council tax currently levied.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
